Text:
Everybody who jumps into this torrent winds up stuck at 99.4% download. I've been seeding this 99.4% back for about 22 hours waiting for someone to get it up to 100%, others have, quite frankly, given up.

If you're going to upload something, especially something people have been looking and waiting for, I think you could upload for more than an hour or so before bailing out and leaving everyone hanging.
